name: Mahjong Touryuumon
overview: MMahjong Touryuumon employs 12 different rulesets in four different game modes. It is designed for everyone from beginner to advanced users. There are eight characters for you to play against, with each of them having a peculiar habit. Moreover, in addition to these eight regular characters, many hidden characters are included. Communication battle mode is also supported. If two WonderSwans are connected with a communication cable, a battle between two players is possible.
